Container.Name: Plex-TVTime
Container.Overview: Plex-TVTime is a Plex webhook handler that automatically updates your TVTime watch history. TV episodes are automatically marked as watched once you complete them on Plex.

Config.Name: Plex Users
Config.Description: Single Plex user or comma separated list of Plex users to send events for

Config.Name: Excluded TV Shows
Config.Description: A comma separated list of TV show titles that will not be sent to TVTime. TVShow title should be identicle to how it appears in your Plex library. If the title includes a comma in it replace it with %2C to avoid conflicting with the comma delimeters in the list

Config.Name: Included TV Shows
Config.Description: Overridden and ignored if PLEX_SHOWS_EXCLUDE is set, otherwise only shows that appear in this list will be sent to TVTime

Config.Name: Logging Level
Config.Description: Set to TRACE or DEBUG for additional logging
